I really like the Twitter app for iPad. I don't know why I hear hugely critical comments about it, but my experience has generally been really good. I love the UI and various features. Of course there are some areas lacking, such as the fact that it auto-opens links and plays sound even though I've muted sound... but honestly that's not a deal-breaker for me.
@schrodingercat I agree, the Twitter app is pretty fantastic IMO

A friend wrote a pretty interesting post on a potential security issue with iPads (http://dseanoneill.wordpress.com/2011/02/17/ipad-silhouetting/) Not a software exploit but more of an environmental hack.
@spencer I'm pretty much the same I do use mine a lot though for communication, but love all the photo apps.

I do lilke the twitter app on Ipad, but I prefer using an app that combines my news feeds...(twitter, FB, Fsquare, Linkedin , Buzz).  Tweetdeck would be the best candidate but they don't have this feature available yet on their Ipad app.
